snippet: As the media company reported a 4 percent rise in quarterly earnings, it also announced it would buy the British television group Channel 5 Broadcasting.
abstract: Viacom reports quarterly earnings of $502 million, or $1.13 a share, up four percent from same period one year earlier; cites increased advertising and higher affiliate fees for its television outlets.
lead_paragraph: As the media company reported a 4 percent rise in quarterly earnings, it also announced it would buy the British television group Channel 5 Broadcasting.

headline.main: Television Revenue Helps Profit at Viacom to Rise 4%
headline.print_headline: Television Revenue Helps Profit at Viacom to Rise 4%
